name: Fidbi Hasan
text: Working with Mujahid at TechWisdom has been incredible. His ability to architect the TechWisdom ERP while balancing startup growth as a co-founder is truly impressive.

name: Asmaul Husna Mayad
text: Mujahid's technical contribution to our skin disease classification research was pivotal. He has a unique talent for applying deep ensemble learning to real-world healthcare challenges.

name: Nusrat Ferdaws
text: The attention to detail Mujahid puts into UI/UX design and SEO optimization is top-tier. He consistently delivers high-performance web applications that exceed client expectations.

name: Imtiaz Audhi
text: Mujahid is a rare talent who understands both the business logic and the technical depth required for enterprise solutions. He makes complex project management look easy.

name: Keka Afroze
text: Collaborating with Mujahid on the TechWisdom website was a seamless experience. His transition from design prototypes to functional React components is flawless.
